column5: Hi all.  I've been on this board for a few years but have not posted anything in a long time.    My wife and I spent a lot of years in the Quetico and usually had great fishing.   It's been about 20 years since we've been back and are looking to take our boat this time to the area.  I've talked with a guy at Camp Quetico on Eva Lake which is just outside the NE corner of the park.  We are mainly looking for smallmouth and pike.    Does anyone have any experience with this outfitter?    He says there is great smallmouth fishing right on Eva lake and has 40 other lakes to check out.  Also, if you were going to that area are there any "drive to" lakes that you would recommend?  Thanks
